title: Message Grouping Component
description: Build a message grouping system that visually clusters consecutive messages from the same sender.
instructions:
Create a MessageGroup widget that groups consecutive messages from the same sender:

1. Only show the sender's avatar on the first message of a group
2. Only show the sender's name on the first message of a group
3. Reduce spacing between messages in the same group
4. Show the timestamp only on the last message of a group
5. Apply different border radius to first, middle, and last messages in a group

Requirements:
- Create a method to determine message position in group (first, middle, last, only)
- Apply appropriate styling based on position
- Handle edge cases (single message groups, different senders)
- Use proper padding/margins for visual grouping
expectedOutput: A complete message grouping system that creates visually connected message clusters with appropriate styling for each position in the group.

hints.text: A message is 'first' if the previous message is from a different sender or doesn't exist, and the next message is from the same sender.
Use BorderRadius.only() to create different corner radii for each position. For sent messages, modify the bottom-right corner; for received, modify the bottom-left.
The padding between grouped messages should be smaller (2-4px) than between separate groups (8-12px). Use position to determine the appropriate EdgeInsets.
